Detailed Description

A PrefsPanel for keybindings.

The code for displaying keybindings is similar to code in MousePrefs. It would be nice to create a new 'Bindings' class which both KeyConfigPrefs and MousePrefs use.

void KeyConfigPrefs::PopulateOrExchange ( ShuttleGui &  S  )  [private]

Normally in classes derived from PrefsPanel this function is used both to populate the panel and to exchange data with it. With KeyConfigPrefs all the exchanges are handled specially, so this is only used in populating the panel.

References ShuttleGuiBase::AddButton(), ShuttleGuiBase::AddChoice(), ShuttleGuiBase::AddFixedText(), ShuttleGuiBase::AddListControlReportMode(), ShuttleGuiBase::AddWindow(), AssignDefaultsButtonID, CategoryID, ClearButtonID, CommandsListID, CurrentComboID, ShuttleGuiBase::EndHorizontalLay(), ShuttleGuiBase::EndStatic(), ShuttleGuiBase::EndThreeColumn(), ShuttleGui::Id(), LoadButtonID, mCat, mCats, mKey, mList, OnCaptureChar(), OnCaptureKeyDown(), SaveButtonID, ShuttleGuiBase::SetBorder(), SetButtonID, ShuttleGuiBase::StartHorizontalLay(), ShuttleGuiBase::StartStatic(), and ShuttleGuiBase::StartThreeColumn().
